functions.name: texture_type
functions.doc:
Query the texture pixel type.

Supported types:

-`u8`

-`u16`

-`f32`

functions.name: texture_mips_max
functions.doc: Query the maximum amount of mip levels.

functions.name: fail_if
functions.doc: Fail the import if the given value is truthy.

functions.name: texture_height
functions.doc: Query the texture height in pixels.

functions.name: fail
functions.doc: Fail the import and log an error with the given values.

functions.name: texture_layers
functions.doc: Query the amount of texture layers.

functions.name: asset_id
functions.doc: Lookup the identifier of the importing asset.

functions.name: asset_id_match
functions.doc:
Match the identifier of the importing asset against the given glob pattern.

Supported pattern syntax:
- '?' matches any single character.
- '*' matches any number of any characters including none.
- '!' inverts the entire match (not per segment and cannot be disabled after enabling).

functions.name: asset_format
functions.doc: Lookup the format of the importing asset.

functions.name: texture_flag
functions.doc:
Change or query a texture import flag.

Supported flags:

-`Lossless`

-`Linear`

-`Mips`

functions.name: texture_mips
functions.doc:
Change or query the amount of mip levels.
Note: Provide 0 to set the maximum amount of mips.

functions.name: texture_flip_y
functions.doc: Apply a y axis mirror transform.

functions.name: texture_channels
functions.doc: Query the amount of channels in the texture.

functions.name: texture_width
functions.doc: Query the texture width in pixels.

functions.name: is_pow2
functions.doc: Check if the given value is a power of two.

functions.name: warn
functions.doc: Log a warning with the given values.
